seek_alliance_funding.title: Capital Concerns
seek_alliance_funding.description: The traders discuss financing options: 'The Cartel has deep pockets and patient investors,' Kess explains. 'We'll need significant startup capital for warehouses, equipment, and operating expenses. Traditional lenders are scared - the Cartel has influence there too. We might need to look for... alternative sources.'

choices.text: 'We could seek political backing and protection.'
'Alternative sources might mean dealing with questionable partners.'
